price: Kuma lalle ne idan wata falala daga Allah ta sãme ku haƙĩƙa, tabbas, yanã cẽwa, kamar wata sõyayya ba ta kasance a tsakãninku da shi ba: "Yã kaitona! Dã na zama tãre da su dai, dõmin in rabonta da rabõ mai girma!"
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَصَٰبَكُمۡ فَضۡلٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ لَيَقُولَنَّ كَأَن لَّمۡ تَكُنۢ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُۥ مَوَدَّةٞ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي كُنتُ مَعَهُمۡ فَأَفُوزَ فَوۡزًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
